title: Starting out in the Evening 2007 Frank Langella DVD9
description:
Starting out in the Evening 2007

Director: Andrew Wagner 

Writers: Brian Morton (novel), Fred Parnes (screenplay)

Stars: Frank Langella, Lauren Ambrose, Patti Perkins, Joie Lee, Lili Taylor


Synopsis: Against the backdrop of Manhattan's literary and publishing world, aging novelist Leonard Schiller is asked by Heather Wolfe, a graduate student and budding literary critic, to agree to interviews. He's reluctant to spend the time: his health is fading and he wants to finish one more book. He's also worried about his daughter, Ariel, who's approaching 40, underemployed, single and wanting a child. But he agrees, hoping Heather can help resurrect interest in his work. As Heather probes Frank's writing and his past, Ariel reconnects to a former lover.

Bonus: Audio commentary, trailer, TV spot
